# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.0.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

**Please DO NOT open public issues for security vulnerabilities.**

If you discover a security issue, please email **<akradadiya28@gmail.com>**.
We will validate and patch it immediately.

## Best Practices

- Use `.env` for all secrets.
- Verify `apps/backend/src/ee` is ignored in your fork.
